skillTree.localised_description: The skill required to weild this weapon is nothing short of extraordinary, yet Skaw uses it as an extension of his body, moving through the fray in a dance a of death and pain.
The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
The God of the Hunt freely gifts his deific zeal for war to all nobles deemed worthy of their responsibilities to Athel Loren.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +25% during forest battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Perfectly at home in the saddle, this warrior can ride at full-pelt through terrain others would struggle with on foot.

effects.description: Attribute: Strider when mounted on an Elven Steed or Great Stag

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

effects.description:
Attribute: Strider for cavalry units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: Following the example of the Doomstar, this warrior specializes in devastating, demoralizing strikes from the sky.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Terror when mounted on a Great Eagle

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear for Hawk Rider units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: A member of the Wardancer kindred, this warrior fights to Loec's silent song.

effects.description: Ability: The Shadows Coil (when not using a mount)
Attribute: Stalk (when not using a mount)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Wardancer and Bladesinger units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior has patrolled the borders of the Wildwood, facing down horrors unknowable and standing unfazed.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Wildwood Ranger units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.
Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.
When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.
There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Crafted by Skaw himself from literally hundreds of shed eagle feathers, the weave of this cloak is incredibly resilient to arrows and other missiles.

attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

skillTree.localised_description: Each of the three thongs of this whip is tipped with the talons of gigantic, and now extinct, birds of prey. Lighter than a normal lash, this weapon is a deadly tool in the hands of one such as Skaw, who is able to lacerate the flesh of a foe with the lightest stroke.
Able to command with precision his companions in the air, great eagles under Skaw's orders are swift and precise killers on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +7 for Great Eagles units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +15 for  Great Eagles units
	(all units in army)

Bonus V. Large: +6 for Great Eagles units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: In their natural hunting territory, eagles become deadly and merciless predators.

effects.description:
Passive: "Woodland's Hunters" for Great Eagle Units
	(all units in army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: Blessed by Elasir, the King of the Eagles himself, this elf has trascended any bonds that his kin has formed with their forest allies, and can now adap the form of them at will.

ui_effects.localised_text: Gains increased melee prowess and speed

skillTree.localised_description: This ritualistic war dance requires neither rhythm nor order, enabling evasion of the enemyâ€™s clumsy attacks, and lethal counterattacks.
Once consumed by Loecâ€™s aspect, one can instinctively evade attack through trickery, mimicking his deception of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Possessed by the Trickster God"

skillTree.localised_description: The Lord embodies the forest; as a result of this, their warriors feel a greater call to defend it.
The Lord's troops are charged to fight for Athel Loren, for their very souls are tethered to its fate.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit deals additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: The skill required to weild this weapon is nothing short of extraordinary, yet Skaw uses it as an extension of his body, moving through the fray in a dance a of death and pain.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Falconer shuns the company of other Elves, but will fight beside them if the forest is in danger from enemies. Then the Scouts and the kindreds will go to the greatest trouble to seek him out to join them in battle.

effects.description: Skaw can throw Spirit Hawks at his enemies.

ui_effects.localised_text: Enemies damaged by flock of birds in melee

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having been with Skaw for many years, this feathery companion stands by it's side in every situation, no matter the risk.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -25% for Great Eagle units
	(all units in army)
